term.title: ionophore

item.text: A compound which can carry specific ions through membranes of cells or organelles.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1280 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)
